sure there are no 
pillows, sheets, blankets 
or other items in the bed 
that could obstruct your 
baby’s breathing or cause 
them to overheat. A high 
proportion of infants who 
die as a result of sudden 
infant death are found 
with their head covered by 
loose bedding. 
• Make sure your baby 
cannot fall out of bed or 
become trapped between 
the mattress and wall.
• Never leave your baby 
alone in the bed, as even 
very young babies can 
wriggle into a dangerous 
position.
